title: Bug 34982Custom BusyIndicator  no hourglass cursor
description: Bug 34982Custom BusyIndicatorno hourglass cursor The test case is in com.ibm.swt.boris.example.custom.BusyIndicatorTest inPlaygroundBoris in swtwork.We just run a sleep() inside a busy indicator.This works on Windows but not GTK.The reason for this, is closely related to bug 34979.The whole showWhile()runs in the UI thread, but gdkwindowsetcursor() is asynchronous.If therunnable does not have its own event loop, setting the cursor will have noeffect.
